products.name: AgentForge - Starter
products.description:
Get Started with Production-Ready Multi-LLM Orchestration

Stop wrestling with different API signatures, rate limits, and response formats. AgentForge gives you a single, elegant Python interface for Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, and Perplexity.

What You Get:
- 550+ tests, 80%+ coverage — Production-grade code you can trust
- 4 LLM providers — Claude, GPT-4, Gemini, Perplexity unified under one API
- Mock provider — Test without API keys or costs
- Docker setup — Dockerfile + docker-compose.yml included
- CLI tool — Quick testing from command line
- Streamlit demo app — Interactive provider comparison
- MIT License — Use in unlimited commercial projects

Core Features:
- Unified async interface — Same API for all providers
- Token-aware rate limiting — Automatic throttling
- Exponential backoff — Intelligent retry on failures
- Function calling — Tool use across all providers
- Structured JSON output — Pydantic validation built-in
- Cost tracking — Per-request and cumulative monitoring
- Streaming support — Real-time responses
- 15KB core — 3x smaller than LangChain

Documentation Included:
- README.md, API_REFERENCE.md, CUSTOMIZATION.md, ARCHITECTURE.md
- 4 code examples (chat, function calling, cost tracking, streaming)

Perfect For: Developers building first AI app, hobbyists exploring LLM APIs, students learning AI development, side project builders.

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

products.name: DocQA Engine - Starter
products.description:
DocQA Engine — Production RAG in Hours, Not Weeks

Stop paying $300-$1,200 for custom RAG builds. Get a complete, tested, production-grade Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline you own forever.

What You Get:
- Hybrid Retrieval System — BM25 keyword search + dense vector similarity for best of both worlds
- 5 Chunking Strategies — Fixed-size, sentence-based, paragraph, recursive, semantic
- Citation Scoring — Every answer includes source citations with confidence scores
- Production REST API — FastAPI with JWT auth, rate limiting (100 req/min), usage metering
- Streamlit Demo UI — Test documents and queries immediately
- Built-in Evaluation — Precision, recall, F1 metrics for continuous quality assessment
- 500+ tests, 80%+ coverage
- Docker ready, MIT License

Tech Stack: Python 3.11+, FastAPI, Streamlit, ChromaDB, scikit-learn, PyPDF2

Documentation: README, CUSTOMIZATION.md, API_REFERENCE.md, DEPLOYMENT.md, ARCHITECTURE.md

Perfect For: Startups building AI documentation search, enterprises migrating off legacy search, developers creating domain-specific Q&A bots, teams needing cited answers from document corpora.

Zero external API costs — fully self-hosted.

30-day money-back guarantee. MIT License.

products.name: Prompt Engineering Toolkit - Starter
products.description:
Prompt Engineering Toolkit — Starter

Stop guessing with your prompts. This toolkit gives you 8 battle-tested prompt patterns, a template management system, and a token counter — everything you need to write effective prompts for Claude, GPT, and other LLMs.

What You Get:
- 8 production-ready prompt patterns (Chain-of-Thought, Few-Shot, Role-Playing, Socratic, Tree-of-Thought, Constraint-Based, Iterative Refinement, Multi-Perspective)
- Template manager with variable substitution
- Token counter for cost estimation
- 10 example templates ready to use
- Quick-start guide
- 190 automated tests (proof it works)
- Source code (Python 3.11+)

Ideal For: Developers integrating LLMs into apps, content creators using AI tools daily, teams standardizing prompt workflows.

30-day money-back guarantee.
